body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Rebecca Hiner. Married to Priscilla D. Hiner. Father of Elizabeth A. Hiner, John D. Hiner, Rebecca J. Hiner, Robert J. Hiner, Thomas F. Hiner, and Hartsel Hiner. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860.
